entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High 16. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening with a few rain showers changing to a few flurries before morning. Snow level 2600 metres lowering to valley bottom before morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
